item.description:
The Ira of The Ira’s Singles Events is Co- Hosting a


NEW AND EXCITING CONCEPT IN THE SINGLES WORLD: A new monthly singles event that promises to have a different theme each month, and be

FUN, ORGINAL, CREATIVE, AND BEST ALL, AN OPPORTUNITY TO


FIND A KEEPER!!!!!

Next event : Friday, April 16

You guessed it: The name of Event Series is: FIND A KEEPER ( Maybe, no more need to search hours and hours the internet for that Keeper Person, just maybe)

Find a Keeper is a singles night for grownups – 40 and over --co-hosted by The Ira-
of the always-fun and welcoming The Ira’s Single Events. Yes, branching out into Western Massachusetts. A chance to meet and mingle with your next door Massachusetts Singles neighbor….( Yay - for expanding your horizons!!)

Join us to eat, drink, mingle and meet new people – maybe find the person you’ve been looking for. At the very least, you’ll have a great time in a warm, and inviting atmosphere -- all with The Ira’s own brand of personal introductions for all.

Pictures from last 3/20 Find a Keeper Series: http://singles.meetup...


THE EXCITING DETAILS BELOW:

WHEN: Friday. April 16, 2010. 6:00 p.m.- whenever

COST: $25.00- You ask? What does this cover?

6:00- 7:00- Mingling, Eating, the mixing and pouring of your favorite libations
7:00-7:30- Sizzling Cooking Demonstration. “ Show her you can cook” by Chef Mick Corduff
7:30- 8:00- More of: Mingling, Eating, Libations

8:00- ? Now that we have eaten, and had a few drinks, let's kick it up a notch and heat up the dance floor

Critically Acclaimed and almost known from around the world: an Awesome DJ from Marx Entertainment ( And how lucky are we?)rocking the house with your favorite tunes


WHERE: Delaney House ( In the Grand Ballroom) 1 Country Club Road, Holyoke, MA 01040. 413-532-1800 ( I can hear you now- OMG- it is so far… That is why you have a car and a GPS System, plus a friend or two to car pool with. Don’t stay at home and complain, do join)

WHERE IS THE FOOD YOU ASK?

Concept food stations ( This means more than one food station) which includes:
Assorted Vegetables with Dip
Chaffer with Garlic Honey Wings
Station 1
Sliders:
Angus Beef & Grilled Marinated Chicken
with Assorted Accompaniments
Warm Rolls
• Station 2 *
• Chicken & Broccoli Stir Fry
• Asian Rice
• Shrimp Lo Mein
• * Station 3 *
• Seasonal Fresh Fruit
• Savannah Belle Salad
• Roasted Red Pepper Napoleon
• Garlic Bread
• Station 4 *
• Chocolate Covered Strawberries
• Assorted Canolli
• Tuxedo Mousse Cake
• Station 5 *
• Coffee, Decaf & Assorted Teas

Plus- Bartenders to prepare your favorite cocktails. Cash Bar/Credit Card Bar….Lol.

For tickets, call 413-535-5077 or visit: http://www.logcabin-d...

Please also send me an email once your ticket has been purchased: mistrchrming@aol.com. Subject Line: April 16 Find a Keeper Series.
Questions: 860-604-5792
item.name: The Ira- Find a Keeper Singles Series. Mingling,Cooking Demo, Dancing!!!
